name: Reddit - Dark Side
description:
CREDIT:

If it isnt for srazzano , this theme could not have made it here. Thanks a million srazzano .
Also to gavin19 @ reddit for helping me fix the RES dropdown
I dont know much about CSS and used style 39637 by user 69536 as a base to build this one.
Firebug , Notepad++ , Stylish editor helped me a lot in creating this theme.
additional_info:
**** PLEASE NOTE : Uncheck "Use subreddit style" on the right column or uncheck "allow reddits to show me custom styles" under preference  ****

**** Please use it with RES Add-On/Extension for better compatibility ****

**** If the theme isnt applied properly or having any issues ,please clear the cache , delete the theme and install it freshly ****

Updates : 
DARK SIDE:

* Changed the background and few elements 
* More changes coming soon.
* It is not fully compatible with RES as of now.

BETA ver 6:

* Removed the Collapse Button on user info
* Comments redesigned
* Scores highlight changed
* Fixed Global Icon !!
* Self Post Highlighted
* Few other small placement changes
Beta Ver 5:

* Flat-list placement corrected
* BUG : Global Icon doesnt show properly

Beta Ver 4:

* Now Click and drag for image expands beyond the content area (Pointed out by garamasala @ reddit)
* Comment karma box changed to milder color.
* Top bar color changed
* Changed the scores color 

Beta Ver 3:

* Updated code to recent change in reddit code for header.

BETA Ver 2:

* Changed the top bar and user area color to dark one!
* Ups and Downs are pretty now. Until you vote , the scores will remain as greyed out and depending on up or downvote , the colors change(FLUKE)


Features:

* RES compatible theme ( Please report is you have any issues )
* Apt for both night and  day browsing.
* Global reddit icon removed and replaced with Home button and subreddit icons removed. Navigation to r/all made easy.
* Shortcut bar revamped
* Tab Menu`s changed 
* Changed the Up and Down arrows 
* Thumbnails made to pop-out
* Quotes within comments are given different background
* Comments made visually pleasing (I hope so)
* Comment karma highlighted 
* Submit page centered
* Submit and community create button changed
* Theme doesnt apply to Preference page
* -- And many more small changes..


Note :

* Many things can go haywire . Cross browser compatibility is doubtful.
* I am not a professional and used the above said theme as base to build this one.
* I made this for 1080p screen , other screen compatibility might have issues. 
* Use it along with RES Add-on / Extension for full compatibility for the current version of the theme.
* Footer content is left out of theme as of now. Planning to make it a collapsible one 
* Due credits are given within the code itself. If i have missed someone or some site, I am extremely sorry , Please report it , so that i can add .
